meanings.definition: A type of Mexican sandal with a woven leather upper.
meanings.sent1: I wore my huaraches to the beach to protect my feet from the hot sand.
meanings.sent2: In Mexico, many people wear huaraches during the summer months.
meanings.sent3: The huaraches danced off my feet and into the ocean!
meanings.sent4: Her huaraches were like little leather nests for her toes.
meanings.sent5: The smell of leather and sunshine always reminds me of my huaraches.

meanings.definition: A dish consisting of fried masa dough topped with various ingredients.
meanings.sent1: I ordered huaraches at the Mexican restaurant and enjoyed the crispy texture.
meanings.sent2: The huaraches were topped with beans, cheese, and salsa for a delicious meal.
meanings.sent3: The huaraches on my plate seemed to be doing a little dance!
meanings.sent4: The huaraches looked like mini edible sandals with tasty toppings.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the huaraches cooking made my mouth water in anticipation.
